decision_conditions: The premises shall not be used for the purposes hereby permitted other than between the hours of
without the prior consent in writing of the Local Planning Authority.

To enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control in the interests of amenity, and in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).

The Local Planning Authority consider it essential that the whole of the development is carried out and that no departure whatsoever is made from the details approved, since the development would not necessarily be acceptable if partly carried out or carried out differently in any degree from the details submitted.  Also, in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.
An active window display shall be provided at all times in the window facing onto South Street.
In the interests of visual amenity, and in order that the development accords with Development Control Policies Development Plan Document Policy DC61.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: No significant problems were identified during the consideration of the application, and therefore it has been determined in accordance with paragraphs 186-187 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019.
description: Change of use from A1 (retail) to Mixed Use A1 (Hairdresser) and Sui Generis (Beauty Salon)
